Package projectone.demo.repository

Interface OrdersRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Orders,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Orders,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Orders,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Orders,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Orders,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Orders>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Orders,Long>
public interface OrdersRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Orders,Long>

  • Method Details

    • findOrdersWithStatusProcessing

      @Query(value="SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_status = \'processing\' ORDER BY order_id ASC", nativeQuery=true) List<Orders> findOrdersWithStatusProcessing()
      Finds orders that are currently in 'processing' status.
      Returns:
      a list of orders with the status 'processing'

    • findMaxId

      @Query(value="SELECT MAX(order_id) FROM orders", nativeQuery=true) Long findMaxId()
      Retrieves the highest order ID from the orders table.
      Returns:
      the maximum order ID

    • findOrdersWithinDateRange

      @Query("SELECT o FROM Orders o WHERE o.orderDatetime BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate ORDER BY o.orderDatetime") ArrayList<Orders> findOrdersWithinDateRange(LocalDateTime startDate, LocalDateTime endDate)
      Finds orders within a specified date range.
      Parameters:
      startDate - the start of the date range
      endDate - the end of the date range
      Returns:
      a list of orders within the specified date range

    • findOrdersWithinDateRangeSorted

      @Query("SELECT o FROM Orders o WHERE o.orderDatetime BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate ORDER BY o.order_id ASC") ArrayList<Orders> findOrdersWithinDateRangeSorted(LocalDateTime startDate, LocalDateTime endDate)
      Finds orders within a specified date range, sorted by order ID.
      Parameters:
      startDate - the start of the date range
      endDate - the end of the date range
      Returns:
      a list of orders sorted by order ID within the specified date range

    • getLastOrder

      @Query(value="SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_id DESC LIMIT 1", nativeQuery=true) List<Orders> getLastOrder()
      Retrieves the most recently placed order.
      Returns:
      a list containing the last order
